DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety efficacy nilotinib newly diagnose chronic myeloid leukemia patient chronic phase
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Nilotinib Newly Diagnosed Chronic Myeloid Leukemia Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients chronic myeloid leukemia chronic phase diagnose within 6 month study entry Treatment tyrosine kinase inhibitor antileukemic agent treatment ( include HSCT ) longer 2 week , exception hydroxyurea and/or anagrelide Uncontrolled congestive heart failure hypertension Myocardial infarction unstable angina pectoris within past 12 month Known T315I mutation QTcF > 450 msec Significant arrhythmias Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
